children.name: IT Path
children.description: Started career in IT support and systems

children.name: Robert Half & TEKsystems
children.title: Contract Desktop Support & IT Technician (1099)
children.description: Short to long-term contracts in IT help desk and field technician roles—Washington Elementary School District (WESD), Walmart, Dell Inc., and DR Horton.

children.name: Apogee Physicians
children.title: Systems Administrator
children.description: Sysadmin and field tech for a Linux-based, nationwide physician staffing company; redesigned and skinned internal apps, proposed a new company logo to the CEO—promoted to Creative Director.

children.name: Encore Discovery Solutions
children.title: IT Engineer
children.description: Sysadmin: help desk in a Windows environment, data center cleanups and hardware management, and forensic acquisitions (clone and image business devices).

children.name: Design Path
children.description: Explored creative design and visual communication

children.name: OfficeMax Print & Document Services
children.title: Desktop Publisher
children.description: Customer design and print support—laser and large-format production (in-house and outsourced), file prep and pre-press, redesign and rebuild of customer projects for print.

children.name: FedEx Kinko's
children.title: Signs & Banners Specialist
children.description: One of two Sign & Banner Specialists: large-format design and production (in-house and outsourced), material ordering and inventory, prototypes and special materials—large-format print, lamination and vinyl jobs.

children.name: Apogee Physicians
children.title: Creative Director
children.description: Partnered with Marketing and Recruiting to define company brand—designed and built the logo, print and online marketing, and recruiting and training materials; branding still in use today.

children.name: Art In Reality, LLC
children.title: Freelance Designer & Developer
children.description: Freelance design services and 1099 contract work—print and web design/development for Arizona Humane Society, National Laser Institute, and JK Realty.

children.name: Engineering Path
children.description: Transitioned into software development and engineering

children.name: Encore Discovery Solutions
children.title: Web Developer
children.description: UI and front-end work for the logged-in electronic discovery platform (DotNetNuke, C#, AJAX)—status reporting for in-house forensic search and discovery jobs for clients.

children.name: Pan Am Education
children.title: PHP Engineer
children.description: VC-funded EdTech startup: video platform connecting TOEFL/TOEIC students with US English teachers—student portal, teacher portal, and sole developer (including outsourcing).

children.name: Salucro Healthcare Solutions
children.title: Front End Developer
children.description: PatientPortal.me team: SOX- and HIPAA-compliant medical billing and payment platform for patients—mobile web app, Epic EMR/EHR integration, and POS terminals.

children.title: Senior Software Engineer (III)
children.description: Presence & Commerce team: website and business dashboards, website insights and recommendations, and GoDaddy's initial social integrations—Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

children.title: Senior Software Engineer (IV)
children.description: United States Independents (USI) team: intelligent customer dashboards, management portals for websites and products, in-app navigation, and recommendations across GoDaddy.

children.title: Principal Software Engineer (V)
children.description: Airo-Growth-Innovation (AGI) team: intelligent customer dashboards, unified product portals, business and product recommendations, and GoDaddy Airo™.
